parent.name: Panini
parent.description: Parent principal - Écosystème complet de compression sémantique universelle
parent.role: Orchestrateur principal et workspace de développement

migration_phases.name: Préparation et sauvegarde
actions: Sauvegarde complète de tous les repositories
Création des scripts de renommage GitHub
Validation de l'état Git de tous les repos

migration_phases.name: Renommage des repositories GitHub
actions: Mise à jour des URLs remotes locales

migration_phases.name: Configuration submodules
actions: Ajout de tous les modules comme submodules
Configuration des chemins selon nouvelle architecture
Mise à jour des références croisées

migration_phases.name: Finalisation et documentation
actions: Mise à jour de toute la documentation

rename_script:
#!/bin/bash
# Script automatique de renommage repositories GitHub
# ATTENTION : Vérifiez les permissions GitHub avant exécution

set -e

echo '🔄 DÉBUT RENOMMAGE REPOSITORIES GITHUB'
echo '======================================'

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS → Panini-FS'
gh repo rename PaniniFS Panini-FS --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-FS.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS Panini-FS

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-CopilotageShared → Panini-CopilotageShared'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-CopilotageShared Panini-CopilotageShared --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-CopilotageShared
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-CopilotageShared
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-CopilotageShared.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-CopilotageShared Panini-CopilotageShared

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-AttributionRegistry → Panini-AttributionRegistry'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-AttributionRegistry Panini-AttributionRegistry --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-AttributionRegistry
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-AttributionRegistry
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-AttributionRegistry.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-AttributionRegistry Panini-AttributionRegistry

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-DatasetsIngestion → Panini-DatasetsIngestion'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-DatasetsIngestion Panini-DatasetsIngestion --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-DatasetsIngestion
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-DatasetsIngestion
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-DatasetsIngestion.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-DatasetsIngestion Panini-DatasetsIngestion

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-ExecutionOrchestrator → Panini-ExecutionOrchestrator'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-ExecutionOrchestrator Panini-ExecutionOrchestrator --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-ExecutionOrchestrator
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-ExecutionOrchestrator
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-ExecutionOrchestrator.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-ExecutionOrchestrator Panini-ExecutionOrchestrator

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-UltraReactive → Panini-UltraReactive'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-UltraReactive Panini-UltraReactive --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-UltraReactive
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-UltraReactive
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-UltraReactive.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-UltraReactive Panini-UltraReactive

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-PublicationEngine → Panini-PublicationEngine'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-PublicationEngine Panini-PublicationEngine --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-PublicationEngine
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-PublicationEngine
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-PublicationEngine.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-PublicationEngine Panini-PublicationEngine

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-SemanticCore → Panini-SemanticCore'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-SemanticCore Panini-SemanticCore --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-SemanticCore
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-SemanticCore
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-SemanticCore.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-SemanticCore Panini-SemanticCore

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-AutonomousMissions → Panini-AutonomousMissions'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-AutonomousMissions Panini-AutonomousMissions --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-AutonomousMissions
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-AutonomousMissions
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-AutonomousMissions.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-AutonomousMissions Panini-AutonomousMissions

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-CoLabController → Panini-CoLabController'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-CoLabController Panini-CoLabController --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-CoLabController
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-CoLabController
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-CoLabController.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-CoLabController Panini-CoLabController

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-CloudOrchestrator → Panini-CloudOrchestrator'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-CloudOrchestrator Panini-CloudOrchestrator --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-CloudOrchestrator
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-CloudOrchestrator
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-CloudOrchestrator.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-CloudOrchestrator Panini-CloudOrchestrator

echo '📝 Renommage PaniniFS-SpecKit-Shared → Panini-SpecKit-Shared'
gh repo rename PaniniFS-SpecKit-Shared Panini-SpecKit-Shared --repo stephanedenis/PaniniFS-SpecKit-Shared
cd /home/stephane/GitHub/PaniniFS-SpecKit-Shared
git remote set-url origin git@github.com:stephanedenis/Panini-SpecKit-Shared.git
cd ..
mv PaniniFS-SpecKit-Shared Panini-SpecKit-Shared

echo '✅ RENOMMAGE TERMINÉ'
echo 'Vérifiez manuellement que tous les repositories sont accessibles'

risks_and_mitigations.GitHub API limits: Utiliser authentification et espacer les requêtes

success_criteria: Tous repositories renommés selon convention Panini-*
Panini comme parent avec submodules organisés
Toute la documentation mise à jour
